Action.description: Action to be performed on the data, e.g., masking

ActionName.description: Name of the action to be performed, or Deny if access to the data is forbidden Action names should be defined in additional taxonomy layers

AppInfo.description: Application specific properties, e.g., intent for using the data, user role and workload characteristics

AssetID.description: Asset ID of the registered asset to be queried in the catalog, or a name of the new asset to be created and registered by Fybrik

Capability.description: Capability declared by the module, e.g., read, delete, copy, write, transform

Connection.description: Details of connection types supported for accessing data stores. Not all are necessarily supported by fybrik storage allocation mechanism used to store temporary/persistent datasets.

name.description: Name of the connection to the data source

ConnectionType.description: Name of the connection type to the data source

DataFlow.description: DataFlow indicates how the data is used by the workload, e.g., it is being read, copied, written or deleted

DataFormat.description: Format in which the data is being read/written by the workload

InfrastructureElement.description: InfrastructureElement defines an infrastructure attribute - its measurement metric, value and relation to Fybrik resources

arguments.description: A list of arguments defining a specific metric, e.g. regions for a bandwidth

attribute.description: Attribute name, defined in additional taxonomy layers

instance.description: A reference to the resource instance, e.g. storage account name

metricName.description: Name of the metric specified in the metrics section

object.description: A resource defined by the attribute ("fybrikstorageaccount","fybrikmodule","cluster")

InfrastructureMetrics.description: Measurement metric defining units and the value scale used for value normalization

scale.description: A scale of values (minimum and maximum) when applicable

type.description: Attribute type, e.g. numeric or string

InstanceType.description: InstanceType enumeration: fybrikmodule, cluster, fybrikstorageaccount, inter-region

Interface.description: Connection type and data format used for data transactions

dataformat.description: DataFormat defines the data format type

protocol.description: Connection type, e.g., S3, Kafka, MySQL

PluginType.description: Type of the plugin, not supported yet

PolicyManagerRequestContext.description: Context in which a policy is evaluated, e.g., details of the data user such as role and intent

db2.description: Connection information for accessing a table in a db2 database

ssl.description: SSL indicates whether the website is secured by an SSL certificate

fybrik-arrow-flight.description: Connection information for accessing data in-memory using API of the Fybrik Arrow Flight server

google-sheets.description: Connection information for accessing data in google-sheets

spreadsheet_id.description: The link to the Google spreadsheet

kafka.description: Connection information for accessing a kafka topic

bootstrap_servers.description: A comma-separated list of host/port pairs to use for establishing the initial connection to the Kafka cluster

key_deserializer.description: Deserializer to be used for the keys of the topic

sasl_mechanism.description: SASL Mechanism to be used (e.g. PLAIN or SCRAM-SHA-512)

schema_registry.description: Host/port to connect the schema registry server

security_protocol.description: Kafka security protocol one of (PLAINTEXT, SASL_PLAINTEXT, SASL_SSL, SSL)

ssl_truststore.description: A truststore or certificate encoded as base64. The format can be JKS or PKCS12.

value_deserializer.description: Deserializer to be used for the values of the topic

mysql.description: Connection information for accessing a table in a mysql database

ssl.description: SSL indicates whether to encrypt data using SSL

postgres.description: Connection information for accessing a table in a postgres database

ssl.description: SSL indicates whether to encrypt data using SSL

s3.description: Connection information for S3 compatible object store

object_key.description: File name or a prefix (for a partitioned asset)
